welcome.greeting:
🤖 Hello {name}!

Welcome to NFT Market Insights Bot! I'm here to help you track NFT collections, set price alerts, and stay updated with the latest market trends.

✨ **Let's get you started:**

🎯 Quick Actions:
• 💰 Check floor prices
• 🏆 Browse top collections
• 🔔 Set price alerts
• 🌍 Change language

Choose an option below or use /help for all commands!

tutorial.title: 🎓 **Quick Tutorial**
tutorial.step1:
**Step 1:** 💰 Check Collection Prices
Use `/price cryptopunks` to get floor price info
tutorial.step2:
**Step 2:** 🏆 Browse Rankings
Use `/rankings` to see top collections by volume
tutorial.step3:
**Step 3:** 🔔 Set Price Alerts
Use `/alerts add cryptopunks 50` to get notified
tutorial.step4:
**Step 4:** 🌍 Choose Your Language
Use `/language` to switch languages
tutorial.complete: 🎉 You're all set! Try any command to get started.

interactive.welcome:
🎓 **Welcome to NFT Market Insights!**

Let's take a quick interactive tour to get you started. This will only take 2 minutes!

✨ **What you'll learn:**
• How to check floor prices
• Browse top collections
• Set up price alerts
• Navigate the bot

Ready to begin?
interactive.step1_desc:
Floor prices show the lowest price for any NFT in a collection. This is crucial for tracking value!

💡 **Try it now:** Click the button below to check CryptoPunks floor price.
interactive.step1_completed:
✅ **Great!** You just checked a floor price!

Notice how you get:
• Current floor price
• 24h change percentage
• Direct link for more details

Ready for the next step?
interactive.step2_desc:
Rankings show the hottest NFT collections by volume, helping you spot trends.

💡 **Try it now:** Click below to see top collections.
interactive.step2_completed:
✅ **Excellent!** You explored the rankings!

You can:
• See top collections by volume
• Navigate through pages
• Get detailed info on any collection

Let's continue!
interactive.step3_desc:
Price alerts notify you when a collection hits your target price. You can set up to 10 alerts!

💡 **Try it now:** Let's set up an alert.
interactive.step3_completed:
✅ **Perfect!** You've learned about alerts!

Remember:
• Up to 10 alerts per user
• Get instant notifications
• Manage alerts anytime with /alerts

One more step!
interactive.step4_desc:
Customize your experience! The bot supports multiple languages and various settings.

💡 **Try it now:** Check out the language options.
interactive.step4_completed:
✅ **Awesome!** You've explored the settings!

You can:
• Switch languages anytime
• Customize your experience
• Access help when needed

You're ready for the final step!
interactive.final_desc:
Congratulations! You're now ready to use NFT Market Insights Bot like a pro!

🚀 **Quick recap:**
• `/price [collection]` - Check floor prices
• `/rankings` - Browse top collections
• `/alerts` - Manage price alerts
• `/language` - Change language
• `/help` - Get help anytime

**Pro tip:** Use the menu buttons for quick access to all features!

Happy trading! 📈

help.title:
🤖 **NFT Bot Help**

Available commands:

commands./price [collection]: 💰 Get floor price for any NFT collection
commands./rankings: 🏆 View top NFT collections by volume
commands.start: 🚀 Start the bot and see welcome message
commands.price: 💰 Get floor price for any NFT collection
commands.rankings: 🏆 View top NFT collections by volume

help.usage:
💡 **Examples:**
• `/price cryptopunks` - Get CryptoPunks floor price
• `/alerts add bored-ape-yacht-club 50` - Set alert at 50 ETH
• `/rankings` - Browse top collections

price_help.title: 💰 **Price Command Help**
price_help.description: Get real-time floor prices for any NFT collection.
examples: • `/price bored ape yacht club` - Get BAYC floor price
tips: • You can use full collection names or common abbreviations
• The bot will suggest similar collections if not found
• Results include 24h price change and volume data

rankings_help.title: 🏆 **Rankings Command Help**
rankings_help.description: Browse top NFT collections ranked by various metrics.
tips: • Use navigation buttons to browse through pages
• Click on any collection for detailed information

alerts_help.title: 🔔 **Alerts Command Help**
alerts_help.description: Set up to 10 price alerts for your favorite collections.
examples: • `/alerts add cryptopunks 100` - Alert when CryptoPunks hits 100 ETH
tips: • You can have up to 10 active alerts
• Alerts trigger when floor price crosses your target

price.usage: 💡 Please provide a collection name. Usage: /price <collection_name>
price.not_found: ❌ Collection '{collection}' not found. Please check the spelling and try again.
price.error: ⚠️ Error fetching price data. Please try again later.

rankings.title: 🏆 **Top NFT Collections**
rankings.error: ❌ Error fetching rankings. Please try again later.
rankings.no_data: ❌ No rankings data available at the moment.

top_sales.title: 💎 **[Top NFT Sales](https://nftpricefloor.com/top-nft-sales)**
top_sales.error: ❌ Error fetching top sales data. Please try again later.
top_sales.no_data: ❌ No sales data available at the moment.

alerts.help:
🔔 **NFT Price Alerts**

**Commands:**
`/alerts list` - View your active alerts
`/alerts add <collection> <price>` - Add price alert
`/alerts remove <id>` - Remove alert by ID

**Examples:**
`/alerts add cryptopunks 50` - Alert when CryptoPunks floor hits 50 ETH
`/alerts add bored-ape-yacht-club 30` - Alert for BAYC at 30 ETH

💡 *Alerts check prices every hour*
alerts.list_empty:
📋 **Your Active Alerts**

🔄 No active alerts found.

Use `/alerts add <collection> <price>` to create your first alert!
alerts.add_usage:
❌ Please provide collection name and target price.

Usage: `/alerts add <collection> <price>`
Example: `/alerts add cryptopunks 50`
alerts.invalid_price:
❌ Invalid price format. Please enter a valid number.

Example: `/alerts add cryptopunks 50`
alerts.add_success:
✅ **Alert Created!**

📊 Collection: {collection}
💰 Target Price: {price} ETH

🔔 You'll be notified when the floor price reaches your target.

*Note: This is a demo implementation. Full alert functionality coming soon!*
alerts.remove_usage:
❌ Please provide alert ID to remove.

Usage: `/alerts remove <id>`
Use `/alerts list` to see your alert IDs.
alerts.remove_success:
✅ **Alert Removed**

🗑️ Alert ID {alert_id} has been removed.

*Note: This is a demo implementation. Full alert functionality coming soon!*
alerts.unknown_command:
❌ Unknown alerts command.

Use `/alerts` to see available options.
alerts.error: ❌ Sorry, something went wrong with alerts. Please try again later.
alerts.title: 🔔 **Price Alert Management**
alerts.no_alerts:
📭 You have no active price alerts.

To set an alert, use: /alert <collection> <price>
alerts.max_alerts: ⚠️ You have reached the maximum limit of 10 alerts. Please remove an existing alert before adding a new one.
alerts.set_error: ❌ Error setting alert. Please try again.

errors.general: ❌ Something went wrong. Please try again.
errors.api_error: 🔌 API error. Please try again later.
errors.invalid_input: ⚠️ Invalid input. Please check your command.
errors.network_error: 🌐 Network error. Please check your connection.
errors.timeout: ⏰ Request timed out. Please try again.
errors.invalid_command: ❌ Invalid command. Use /help to see available commands.

common.network_error: 🌐 Network connection error. Please check your internet and try again.
common.api_error: 🔧 Service temporarily unavailable. Please try again in a few minutes.
common.timeout_error: ⏱️ Request timed out. Please try again.
common.rate_limit_error: ⏳ Too many requests. Please wait a moment and try again.
common.invalid_input: ❌ Invalid input. Please check your command and try again.
common.not_found_error: 🔍 Requested data not found. Please verify the collection name.

search.instructions:
🔍 **Search Collections**

To get instant price data and market insights for any NFT collection, use:

`/price [collection name]`

**Examples:**
• `/price cryptopunks`
• `/price bored ape yacht club`
• `/price azuki`

digest.title:
📰 **Daily Digest**

Get a daily summary of NFT market activity delivered to your Telegram.
digest.status_enabled:
✅ **Daily Digest: ENABLED**

📅 Delivery Time: {time} UTC
📊 Content: Daily ranking snapshot

💡 You'll receive a daily market summary at your preferred time.
digest.status_disabled:
❌ **Daily Digest: DISABLED**

📊 Content: Daily ranking snapshot

💡 Enable to receive daily market summaries.
digest.toggle_on: ✅ Daily digest enabled! You'll receive daily market summaries at {time} UTC.
digest.toggle_off: ❌ Daily digest disabled. You won't receive daily summaries anymore.
digest.time_updated: ⏰ Digest delivery time updated to {time} UTC.
digest.time_selection:
⏰ **Select Delivery Time**

Choose when you'd like to receive your daily digest (UTC time):
digest.current_settings:
📋 **Current Digest Settings**

Status: {status}
Delivery Time: {time} UTC
Content: Daily ranking snapshot
digest.explore_more: Want to explore more? Use /rankings for full market data
digest.help:
📰 **Daily Digest Help**

The daily digest feature sends you a summary of NFT market activity once per day at your preferred time.

**Features:**
• Daily ranking snapshot
• Top collections by volume
• Market highlights
• Delivered via Telegram

**Commands:**
• Toggle on/off
• Set delivery time
• View current settings
digest.sample_content:
📰 **Daily NFT Market Digest**
📅 {date}

🏆 **Top Collections (24h Volume)**

1. CryptoPunks - 1,234 ETH
2. Bored Ape Yacht Club - 987 ETH
3. Azuki - 654 ETH
4. Doodles - 432 ETH
5. Moonbirds - 321 ETH

📊 **Market Highlights**
• Total Volume: 15,678 ETH
• Active Collections: 2,345
• Top Sale: 150 ETH

🔗 [View Full Analytics](https://nftpricefloor.com)
